column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/8726de26ee0010eaf64d44d69cc9b8e09e580a37 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

Thanks for the fixes!

@codeshark Next time you should fix your own bugs :p
I'm sure this can be done more elegantly with signals.\nThen again, due to the nature of the bug fixes I'm going to merge this immediately.\n
I'll add a ToDo in my local build :).\n
